name: The Fox Awaits Me Hana
summary: In "The Fox Awaits Me Hana," players take on the role of a young man named Takahiro who, after getting lost in the mountains, stumbles upon a mysterious shrine dedicated to the fox deity. He is then suddenly transported to a mystical world where he meets a beautiful fox girl named Hana. As the story progresses, Takahiro learns more about Hana and her past, and the player's choices will determine the outcome of the game.
